programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants whose breakfast offerings bring them to legendary status. First, Buddy's off to the Pancake Pantry whose pancake recipe is top secret, their current owner doesn't even know it!

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Seafood may not be your first thought when you think of a city like Detroit, Michigan, but at the Belgian-inspired Cadieux Cafe, Buddy tries the best bowl of steamed mussels and braised Belgian rabbit.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Surviving The Sleepover
programme.desc: When Hannah is invited to popular Melissa's sleepover, she has no idea that she was invited as a prank. But when the night turns more sinister, Hannah's mother becomes her only hope for survival.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Genius is widely considered to be the ability to change the world in an incredible way: inventing new technology, deciphering the mysteries of the universe, or creating transcendent art.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the midst of the 1970s folk art movement, art student Martha Nelson creates a one-of-a-kind doll to sell at local Kentucky craft markets.

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: Rise of The New Dons focuses on the deadly conflict between the Families' old guard and a new generation of younger, American-born mobsters willing to defy the authority of the bosses.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: From the world's largest trebuchet to Nazi super cannons, these are the deadly weapons that rain destruction and spread fear on the battlefield.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Throughout the world there are mysterious ancient stones shaped into perfect spheres. Some completely defy explanation. Could the mystery of the stone spheres provide clues about humankind's alien past?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the midst of the 1970s folk art movement, art student Martha Nelson creates a one-of-a-kind doll to sell at local Kentucky craft markets.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: A cold case that ignites every parent's worst fears: on Christmas morning, 1945, five siblings vanish from their family home in West Virginia during a raging fire.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: More than 80% of the Earth's oceans remain unexplored, and in many ways, the underwater world is the final frontier. As new technology allows us to explore oceans and deep lakes more than ever before.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: Yamagata is famous for its food, some unique to late autumn and certain localities. Our gourmet cyclist explores the regional cuisine, from edible chrysanthemums to Japanese taro, turnips and salmon.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Hiroshima. Explore the ravages of war and a call for peace at the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Museum. Join a hunt for new designs born from traditional, regional crafts.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Stone Age Earth: In the presence of a mysterious black obelisk, pre-humans discover the use of tools--and weapons--violently taking first steps toward intelligence. 1999: On Earth's moon astronauts uncover another mysterious black obelisk. 2001: Between Earth and Jupiter, the spacecraft's intelligent computer makes a mistake that kills most of the human crew--then continues to kill to hide its error. Beyond Time: The sole survivor of the journey to Jupiter ascends to the next level of humanity.

programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Africa Live

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 28
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 55
programme.desc: Lorna Dunkley presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks - Self-Made Woman
programme.desc: From sheep breeder to shearer, grain trader to truck driver. She was raised to be a wife and mother. Instead, this woman has set up more businesses and tackled more jobs than many people do in a lifetime.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 6
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong continues his road trip through Central Gippsland, Victoria. From locals he learns how to catch European carp for an ancient recipe for fish sauce and how to hunt and butcher wild deer.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 6
programme.desc: Jess and her ride crew navigate the stunning but rugged Konkan Coast, switching between bikes and boats. The team race toward Mumbai, determined to get Pulak to the city in time to visit his family.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 18 - Western Bulldogs v Adelaide Crows
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 18 - GWS Giants v Geelong Cats
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 193
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and today's top stories, with more reporters to tell you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 18 - Richmond v Essendon
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 6
programme.desc: Jess and her ride crew navigate the stunning but rugged Konkan Coast, switching between bikes and boats. The team race toward Mumbai, determined to get Pulak to the city in time to visit his family.

programme.title: This Place - Big Rock: Walga
programme.desc: Walga Rock has one of the largest galleries of Aboriginal rock paintings in Western Australia. Walga, meaning blood, is one of the largest monoliths in Australia and maintained by the Wajarri Elders and community.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Mallacoota, Bibra Lake, Narrandera
programme.desc: Narelda soaks up the beauty of Mallacoota with a pair of proud locals, Ernie gets a tour of the Bibra Lake wetlands and Bianca meets a fashion designer making a splash with her cultural designs..

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 25
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 23
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 26
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 6
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong continues his road trip through Central Gippsland, Victoria. From locals he learns how to catch European carp for an ancient recipe for fish sauce and how to hunt and butcher wild deer.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 6
programme.desc: Jess and her ride crew navigate the stunning but rugged Konkan Coast, switching between bikes and boats. The team race toward Mumbai, determined to get Pulak to the city in time to visit his family.

programme.title: Larapinta - Episode 4
programme.desc: Talia visits Ntaria, birthplace of renowned artist, Albert Namatjira. Uncle Conrad Ratara shares a dreaming story about Palm Valley, an oasis deep in the heart of the desert. What is the mystery behind its existence?

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia - 1980: Joh Bjelke-Petersen, Reg Livermore, Rich Neville
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson interviews guests Joh Bjelke-Petersen, Reg Livermore and Richard Neville.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Episode 23
programme.desc: The National Press Club hosts public debates and discussions that shape Australia now and into the future. Home to national conversations with decision-makers and influencers; driving the national debate forward.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 26
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Tom Gleeson's Secrets of the Australian Museum
programme.desc: For the first time, cameras go behind the scenes at the Australian Museum. Join Gold Logie winner Tom Gleeson as he discovers the labs, treasures and action leading up to their biggest exhibition ever.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 28
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Thomas Oriti and Kathryn Robinson present an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 28
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 24
programme.desc: Nine days before parliament resumes for the opening session of the 48th Federal Parliament, guest host Patricia Karvelas and the panel discuss the week in politics and look ahead to Saturday's Tasmanian Election.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: A deadly battle of wits ensues between the navies of the United States and the U.S.S.R when the Soviet Union's most advanced nuclear submarine makes an unauthorized approach to America's eastern seaboard.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood is the "Man With No Name," who teams up with equally lethal Lee Van Cleef in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

programme.desc: Sir Richard Attenborough directs Sean Connery, Gene Hackman, Anthony Hopkins and Robert Redford in this gripping and controversial tale about a daring WWII military operation.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic gives Rosalie a makeover to avoid her being made fun of. Sigis has to find his keys but Cindy, furious with him, does everything possible to get in his way.

programme.title: Ernest Et Celestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Celestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: June 1940. The German army invades Belgium. Time to run: it is the exodus. Ernest and Colette try to flee with their grandparents but the way is fraught with pitfalls and they are extremely worried about their parents.

programme.title: Matiere Grise (30') 2025 Rtbf
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'azur.

programme.title: Waouh !
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: In February 2022, when the war breaks out in Ukraine, Oleh Borivskiy's restaurant is bombed. He leaves the country to save his daughter, who has a heart condition. After a 3,600-kilometer journey, the family settles in Switzerland and starts over, determined to rebuild their lives.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: She won the 2019 US Open and ranked 4th in the world. Since then, she has faced numerous injuries but aims to regain her level and be among the best players in the world again: Canadian tennis player Bianca Andreescu is our guest.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir
programme.desc: Mental health remains at the heart of many of society's prejudices. And the black community is no exception. Schelby, Keithy and Irdens observe that when it comes to those closest to them, it is a subject that is often avoided. Why?

programme.title: Serge a Paris
programme.desc: Serge goes to the Theâtre les Blancs-Manteaux with the comedian Anne Roumanoff, where she first performed. He visits the specialist bookshop Les Mots a la Bouche and meets columnist Mathieu Bock-Cote for a ''civilised chat''.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: We leave the Cristallina mountain hut en-route for that of Garzonera. On the programme: Alpine stars and carnivorous plants. From Garzonera, the route takes us to Campo Tencia and an opportunity to discover the pine trees and ibex of the Via Idra.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Fifax, an artist with a fondness for freedom, adventurous and visionary, opens the doors to his world of dreams.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Chargeurs Reunis, a company at the cutting edge of textile innovation. Do you know why the bicycle used to be known as ''the little queen''? At MHP, the Poisson family restores Boulle work furniture and objects. The hooded dress makes a comeback. Charlie Le Mindu combines fashion and haute coiffure.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: Château de Cadillac, its rich and multi-facetted history bearing witness to France's 17th century heritage. Artist and cabinet-maker, Kostia combines tradition and innovative design. Dries Van Noten bids farewell with a collection faithful to his years of work. From micro to macro-embroidery, Cyrielle Leclere explores the limits of traditional craftwork.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La
programme.desc: The new generation is recognised as being more enterprising. But their priority is passion much more than money. Megan, David and Kendrick embody this very new vision of entrepreneurship.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: 100 % Logique - La Reponse Est Sous Vos Yeux
programme.desc: The quiz that, rather than testing general knowledge and culture, tests the participants' powers of logic, observation and common sense. One hundred candidates compete for a jackpot that could climb to 100,000 euros. Who will manage to overcome all the obstacles and reach the final question?

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Jacob, Emily, Nathalie and Lionel are drama students and have been selected by their teacher Marianne, to represent Guadeloupe for the West Indies-French Guiana drama competition. As Jacob and Emily begin to feel a mutual attraction, the spark between Lionel and Nathalie is rekindled.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Jacob is taken aback by the revelation made by Iris, with whom he'd had a one night stand. Following her mother's death, Nathalie is in search of the father she has never known. Lionel has begun dealing in drugs again.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Lionel has to face up to what his father has done, actions that could have serious consequences. Marianne is delighted by the work accomplished by the pair Jacob and Emily. Meanwhile, Nathalie is making progress in her search for her father.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Putting her all into preparing for the competition, Emily is supported by Marianne in her choice of a major text from Haitian literature. Despite everything the rehearsals turn out to be a total disaster. The police are taking a close interest in Lionel and his family.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Chargeurs Reunis, a company at the cutting edge of textile innovation. Do you know why the bicycle used to be known as ''the little queen''? At MHP, the Poisson family restores Boulle work furniture and objects. The hooded dress makes a comeback. Charlie Le Mindu combines fashion and haute coiffure.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Preserving the trace, refusing to allow memories to disappear... Valerie Jolly moulds objects that bear witness to times past, stone, pipes, things abandoned... from figurative to abstract, expanding the field of possibility...

programme.title: Gaetan Roussel, Creation < eclect!Que >, Aux Francofolies De La Rochelle 2024
programme.desc: For the 40th edition of the Francofolies de La Rochelle, Gaetan Roussel presents ''eclect!que'', a brand new creation. A tireless wordsmith, the magician of French chanson will be welcoming a host of prestigious guests at the Grand Theâtre de la Coursive to share the moment with him.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: In February 2022, when the war breaks out in Ukraine, Oleh Borivskiy's restaurant is bombed. He leaves the country to save his daughter, who has a heart condition. After a 3,600-kilometer journey, the family settles in Switzerland and starts over, determined to rebuild their lives.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Before becoming a painter Pierre Sojo had a passion for drawing as an art in its own right. Today his drawings also serve as preparatory sketches prior to his painting.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Sarah Bernhardt, a Corps Perdu
programme.desc: World-wide celebrity, Sarah Bernhardt (1844-1923) was the first actress to travel the five continents. Modern, transgressive and forever remembered as a ''monstre sacre'', a term Jean Cocteau invented to describe her. Her life, her struggles, her triumphs: we look back at the life and career of a free woman.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Un Homme Parfait
programme.desc: Maxime's life is one long success story: brilliant student, dazzling career, he's both a loving husband and caring father. A man above suspicion. So much so that when his daughter, Claire, accuses him of incest and tells her mother about his actions, Daphne finds it difficult to believe her.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: Château de Cadillac, its rich and multi-facetted history bearing witness to France's 17th century heritage. Artist and cabinet-maker, Kostia combines tradition and innovative design. Dries Van Noten bids farewell with a collection faithful to his years of work. From micro to macro-embroidery, Cyrielle Leclere explores the limits of traditional craftwork.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Sigis discovers a graffiti tag at school and decides to reply, but finds himself face-to-face with the tagger. Felix is stressed-out because he has to kiss an actress in one scene.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Encounter ep 22
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 8
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: For the Love ep 1
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 8
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 8
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 5
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 26 (Semifinals)
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 8 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 1
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 5
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 1
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.
